Description: Icon-only buttons must have accessible names
All form controls need labels or aria-label
Interactive elements must support keyboard interaction
Use semantic HTML before ARIA attributes
Async updates need aria-live for screen readers
Decorative icons should be hidden from screen readers
All interactive elements need visible focus states
Never remove outline without providing replacement
Checkbox/radio must share hit target with label
Inputs need autocomplete attribute for autofill
Use semantic input type attributes
Never prevent paste functionality
Disable spellcheck on emails and codes
Keep submit enabled and show spinner during requests
Show error messages inline near the problem field
Do: Inline error with focus on first error

Description: Virtualize lists exceeding 50 items
Do: Use virtual list for large datasets

Description: Avoid layout reads during render phase
Do: Read layout in effects or callbacks

Description: Group DOM operations to minimize reflows
Add preconnect links for CDN domains
Lazy-load images below the fold
URL should reflect current UI state
Stateful components should support deep-linking
Do: Enable sharing current view via URL

Description: Destructive actions require confirmation
Use proper Unicode characters
Handle text overflow properly
Use non-breaking spaces for units and brand names
Never disable zoom in viewport meta
Avoid transition: all - specify properties
Never use outline-none without replacement
Use Intl for date/number formatting
AI responses should stream progressively not appear all at once
Do: Use SSE/WebSocket with progressive text reveal and cursor indicator
Don't: Wait for complete response then show all at once

Description: Show distinct thinking state when AI is processing with animated indicator
Do: Use pulsing dots or skeleton with aria-busy='true'

Description: AI-generated content should include verifiable source citations
Do: Link citations inline with hover preview and source indicator
Code Example Bad:
AI says this is true.

// no source

Description: Provide clear regenerate/retry option for AI responses
Do: Show regenerate button with different prompt option
Don't: No way to get alternative response

Description: AI code outputs need one-click copy with feedback
Do: Add copy button with checkmark confirmation on code blocks
Don't: No copy button on code output

Description: Show skeleton screens instead of spinners for layout-stable loading
Do: Use skeleton matching final layout shape with shimmer animation
Don't: Use spinner that causes layout shift

Description: Skeleton elements must match the actual content dimensions
Do: Match skeleton to real content height/width/aspect-ratio

Description: Skeleton loading states need proper ARIA attributes
Do: Use aria-busy='true' and aria-label on skeleton containers

Description: Toast notifications need appropriate auto-dismiss timing by severity
Do: Info: 3-5s auto-dismiss; Error: manual dismiss; Success: 3s
Don't: Same duration for all types or no auto-dismiss

Description: Limit visible toasts and queue excess ones
Do: Max 3-5 visible toasts with queue; newest on top or bottom consistent

Description: Destructive action toasts should include undo/action button
Do: Include undo CTA on delete/destructive toasts with countdown
Code Example Good: toast({ message: 'Deleted', action: { label: 'Undo', onClick: undo } })

Description: Toast notifications must use proper ARIA live regions
Do: Use role='alert' for errors and aria-live='polite' for info

Description: Declare supported color schemes in meta tag and CSS
Do: Add color-scheme: dark light in CSS and meta tag
Don't: Only toggle class without declaring scheme

Description: Respect OS-level dark mode preference as default
Do: Use prefers-color-scheme media query for initial state

Description: Adjust images and illustrations for dark mode backgrounds
Do: Provide dark variants or use CSS filter for appropriate contrast
Don't: Same bright images on dark background

Description: Use container queries for component-level responsive design
Do: Use @container for component sizing independent of viewport

Description: Interactive elements need minimum 44x44px touch targets on mobile
Do: Ensure all buttons/links have min 44px touch target with padding

Description: Use scroll-snap for horizontal carousels on touch devices
Do: Implement scroll-snap-type and scroll-snap-align for smooth stops

Description: Empty states need helpful illustration and clear CTA for next action
Do: Show contextual message with illustration and primary action CTA
Don't: Blank page or generic 'No data' text

Description: Failed content loads need clear error state with retry action
Do: Show error message with retry button and fallback content option
Code Example Bad: // catch silently or show stack trace
